lead_paragraph: The United States economy grew at an annual rate of just 0.2 percent in the first quarter, news that helped push down stock prices.

headline.print_headline: Anemic First-Quarter Economic Growth Leads to a Lower Market
headline.main: Modest Loss for the Market After a Report of Sharply Slowing Growth

snippet: The United States economy grew at an annual rate of just 0.2 percent in the first quarter, news that helped push down stock prices.
abstract: Stock market slumps following downgraded assessment of economy from Federal Reserve and first quarter reports from Commerce Dept indicating barely discernible growth rate overall.
